alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 8:17AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Trumbull, eastern Geauga, northeastern Lake, Ashtabula, southwestern Erie and western Crawford Counties through 900 AM EDT... At 816 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Madison to near Garrettsville. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ashtabula, Conneaut, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Cortland, Geneva, Madison, Girard, North Kingsville, Kinsman, North Bloomfield, Orwell, Albion, Andover, Linesville, West Farmington, Adamsville, Pymatuning Central, Bristolville, Harmonsburg and Pymatuning North. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
